value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Model Performance Tuning in DAX Studio - By Marco Russo
value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Marco Russo contributor to DAX Studio will be giving us a deep dive and demo around using DAX Studio for Model Performance Tuning.
